about.title: About Sanatanadharmam.in
about.intro: Sanatanadharmam.in is created with a simple purpose — to make the timeless wisdom of Sanātana Dharma accessible to everyone. Our mission is to provide authentic scriptures, stotras, puja-vidhis, and traditional knowledge in a format that is easy to read, understand, and practice in daily life.

vision.description: To become a comprehensive digital repository of Hindu scriptures and devotional literature.
focusAreas: Stotras, mantras, sukthas, and daily prayers
Teachings from classical texts and spiritual traditions
Accurate transliteration for learning and chanting
vision.goal: To build a digital library that preserves and shares the essence of Sanātana Dharma for future generations.

problemsAddressed: No simple guide for pujas or daily practice
whyWeCreated.purpose: To offer clean, organized, easy-to-read spiritual content in one place.

commitment: To continually improve accuracy and clarity
To update the library with more scriptures and stotras
To respect the sanctity of traditional knowledge
To keep all content free and accessible
about.disclaimer: We do not claim to be scholars. This website is maintained with devotion and sincerity, and we encourage users to cross-verify important texts with traditional or authoritative sources whenever required.

joinUs.message: Sanātana Dharma is a way of life — a path of truth, compassion, and universal harmony.
invite: Support its growth through feedback or contributions
